about_the_game:
Insurmountable - Supporter Pack

About this Pack

This is a collection of bonus goodies for all those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Insurmountable!

Contents

  • The complete Insurmountable soundtrack
  • A little "luminous zeppelin follower" who accompanies you on your journey
  • A weather rocket. Use it to clear up the weather once!
  • Some exclusive visual changes to the base camp

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!

Insurmountable - Supporter Pack

About this Pack

name: Insurmountable - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64 or 32 BIT)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9 aspect ratios; 16:10 and 21:9 aspect ratios also supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 64-BIT
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770, AMD FX™-9590, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 with 6GB VRAM, AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 8GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9 aspect ratios; 16:10 and 21:9 aspect ratios are also supported

short_description: This is a collection of bonus goodies for all those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Insurmountable!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
